description: This file defines the `InvalidMacroException` class, a custom exception for handling errors related to invalid macros in the macro substitution context.

classes.name: InvalidMacroException
classes.description: Custom exception class thrown when an invalid macro is encountered during macro parsing.

methods.name: InvalidMacroException(String message, Throwable cause)
methods.description: Constructor accepting an error message and a cause.

methods.name: getMessage()
methods.description: Returns the error message, appending macro line info if available.

methods.name: getLocalizedMessage()
methods.description: Returns the localized error message, appending macro line info if available.

methods.name: getMacroLine()
methods.description: Returns the macro line associated with this exception.

methods.name: setMacroLine(String macro)
methods.description: Sets the macro line associated with this exception.
